title: 1924년 Greenspan 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Greenspan. 판결일: 1924-10-15. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Meyer Greenspan v. Carl H. Pearson
**판결일**: 1924-10-15
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 210 A.D. 833

## 판결문 요약


Order affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements. No opinion. Present— Clarke, P. J., Dowling, Finch, McAvoy and Martin, JJ.
...
